title: TLC

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **My 600 lb. life**: Choose a player to gain weight that night. If the player visits a player over 2 houses away (based on player order), their ability will fail.
- **My Strange Addiction**: Choose a player to get an addiction to drywall. Causing any players that your target visits to get an alert of Drywall in their house.
- **My Crazy Obsession**: Choose a player to become obsessed with being outside. If the player visits to fail if they visit a player within 2 houses (based on player order), their ability will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immune.
- Roleblock Immune players are not affected by Ability 1 and 3.
- Every ability has a one night cooldown.

desc:
Post 5405
*You are obsessed with TLC... for some reason...*
